00070 /**
00071    ## FONCTION: 
00072         void pck_ml_clust(c_lst_pockets *pockets, s_fparams *params)
00073   
00074    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00075         This function will apply a mutliple linkage clustering algorithm on the given
00076         list of pockets. Considering two pockets, if params->ml_clust_min_nneigh
00077         alpha spheres are separated by a distance lower than params->ml_clust_max_dist,
00078         then merge the two pockets.
00079   
00080    ## PARAMETRES:
00081         @ c_lst_pockets *pockets  : The list of pockets
00082         @ s_fparams *params       : Parameters of the program, including single  
00083                                                                 linkage parameters
00084   
00085    ## RETURN: 
00086         void
00087   
00088 */
00089 void pck_ml_clust(c_lst_pockets *pockets, s_fparams *params)
00090 {
00091         node_pocket *pcur = NULL,
00092                                 *pnext = NULL ,
00093                                 *curMobilePocket = NULL ;
00094 
00095         node_vertice *vcur = NULL ;
00096         node_vertice *curMobileVertice = NULL ;
00097 
00098         s_vvertice *vvcur = NULL,
00099                            *mvvcur = NULL ;
00100         float vcurx,
00101                   vcury,
00102                   vcurz ;
00103         
00104         /* Flag to know if two clusters are next to each other by single linkage 
00105          * clustering...or not */
00106         int nflag ;
00107         
00108         if(!pockets) {
00109                 fprintf(stderr, "! Incorrect argument during Single Linkage Clustering.\n") ;
00110                 return ;
00111         }
00112 
00113         /* Set the first pocket */
00114         pcur = pockets->first ;
00115         while(pcur) {
00116                 /* Set the second pocket */
00117                 curMobilePocket = pcur->next ;
00118                 while(curMobilePocket) {
00119                         nflag = 0 ;
00120                         /* Set the first vertice/alpha sphere center of the first pocket */
00121                         vcur = pcur->pocket->v_lst->first ;
00122                         while(vcur && nflag <= params->sl_clust_min_nneigh){
00123                                 /* Set the first vertice/alpha sphere center of the second pocket */
00124                                 curMobileVertice = curMobilePocket->pocket->v_lst->first ;
00125                                 vvcur = vcur->vertice ;
00126                                 vcurx = vvcur->x ;
00127                                 vcury = vvcur->y ;
00128                                 vcurz = vvcur->z ;
00129 
00130                                 /* Double loop for vertices -> if not near */
00131                                 while(curMobileVertice && nflag <= params->sl_clust_min_nneigh){
00132                                         mvvcur = curMobileVertice->vertice ;
00133                                         if(dist(vcurx, vcury, vcurz, mvvcur->x, mvvcur->y, mvvcur->z)
00134                                                 < params->sl_clust_max_dist) {
00135                                                                                                         /*if beneath the clustering max distance, increment the distance flag*/
00136                                                 nflag++;
00137                                         }
00138                                         curMobileVertice = curMobileVertice->next;
00139                                 }
00140                                 vcur = vcur->next ;
00141                         }
00142 
00143                         pnext =  curMobilePocket->next ;
00144                         /* If the distance flag has counted enough occurences of near neighbours, merge pockets*/
00145                         if(nflag >= params->sl_clust_min_nneigh) {
00146                                 /* If they are next to each other, merge them */
00147                                 mergePockets(pcur,curMobilePocket,pockets);
00148                         }
00149                         curMobilePocket = pnext ;
00150                 }
00151 
00152                 pcur = pcur->next ;
00153         }
00154 }
00155 
00156 /**
00157    ## FONCTION:
00158         void pck_ml_clust(c_lst_pockets *pockets, s_fparams *params)
00159   
00160    ## SPECIFICATION:
00161         This function will apply a mutliple linkage clustering algorithm on the given
00162         list of pockets. Considering two pockets, if params->ml_clust_min_nneigh
00163         alpha spheres are separated by a distance lower than params->ml_clust_max_dist,
00164         then merge the two pockets.
00165   
00166    ## PARAMETRES:
00167         @ c_lst_pockets *pockets  : The list of pockets
00168         @ s_fparams *params       : Parameters of the program, including single
00169                                                                 linkage parameters
00170   
00171    ## RETURN:
00172         void
00173   
00174 */
00175 void pck_ml_clust_test(c_lst_pockets *pockets, s_fparams *params)
00176 {
00177         node_pocket *pcur = NULL,
00178                                 *pnext = NULL ,
00179                                 *curMobilePocket = NULL ;
00180 
00181         node_vertice *vcur = NULL ;
00182         node_vertice *curMobileVertice = NULL ;
00183 
00184         s_vvertice *vvcur = NULL,
00185                            *mvvcur = NULL ;
00186         float vcurx,
00187                   vcury,
00188                   vcurz ;
00189 
00190         /* Flag to know if two clusters are next to each other by single linkage
00191          * clustering...or not */
00192         int nflag,
00193                 restart = 0;
00194 
00195         if(!pockets) {
00196                 fprintf(stderr, "! Incorrect argument during Single Linkage Clustering.\n") ;
00197                 return ;
00198         }
00199         printf("ML starting\n") ;
00200         /* Set the first pocket */
00201         pcur = pockets->first ;
00202         while(pcur) {
00203                 /* Set the second pocket */
00204                 curMobilePocket = pcur->next ;
00205                 while(curMobilePocket) {
00206                         nflag = 0 ;
00207                         /* Set the first vertice/alpha sphere center of the first pocket */
00208                         vcur = pcur->pocket->v_lst->first ;
00209                         while(vcur && nflag <= params->sl_clust_min_nneigh){
00210                                 /* Set the first vertice/alpha sphere center of the second pocket */
00211                                 curMobileVertice = curMobilePocket->pocket->v_lst->first ;
00212                                 vvcur = vcur->vertice ;
00213                                 vcurx = vvcur->x ;
00214                                 vcury = vvcur->y ;
00215                                 vcurz = vvcur->z ;
00216 
00217                                 /* Double loop for vertices -> if not near */
00218                                 while(curMobileVertice && nflag <= params->sl_clust_min_nneigh){
00219                                         mvvcur = curMobileVertice->vertice ;
00220                                         if(dist(vcurx, vcury, vcurz, mvvcur->x, mvvcur->y, mvvcur->z)
00221                                                 < params->sl_clust_max_dist) {
00222                                                                                                         /*if beneath the clustering max distance, increment the distance flag*/
00223                                                 nflag++;
00224                                                 break ; /* Ensure that at least N vertice in one of the
00225                                                                    two pockets have N vertice at a distance
00226                                                                    <= SL_MAX_DST */
00227                                         }
00228                                         curMobileVertice = curMobileVertice->next;
00229                                 }
00230                                 vcur = vcur->next ;
00231                         }
00232 
00233                         pnext =  curMobilePocket->next ;
00234                         /* If the distance flag has counted enough occurences of near neighbours, merge pockets*/
00235                         if(nflag >= params->sl_clust_min_nneigh) {
00236                                 /* If they are next to each other, merge them */
00237                                 mergePockets(pcur,curMobilePocket,pockets);
00238                                 restart = 1 ; printf("Merging\n") ;
00239                                 break ;
00240                         }
00241                         curMobilePocket = pnext ;
00242                 }
00243 
00244                 /* Restart the algorithm if two pockets have been merged */
00245                 if(restart == 1) {
00246                         restart = 0 ;
00247                         pcur = pockets->first ;
00248                 }
00249                 else pcur = pcur->next ;
00250         }
00251         printf("ML ending\n") ;
00252 }
